about_the_game:
Decimated is a 3rd-person multiplayer survival RPG. Battle, scavenge, transport, trade, conquer, and build in a post-apocalyptic world.
Post Apocalyptic World - With Jetpacks!

Decimated is a multiplayer third-person survival role-playing game, developed using Unreal Engine 5, and set in a persistent dystopian cyberpunk universe.

Choose Your Path
Players begin as human citizens, cyborg cops or wasteland marauders and can develop their character throughout missions. Law-abiding citizens can join the ranks of cyber police to safeguard the global order. Criminals can play as the marauders to loot and kill indiscriminately.
A vast and hostile apocalyptic environment offers a plethora of challenges for any style of gameplay.

Fight For Your Survival
Players can compete against each other, or cooperate to explore, scavenge, trade, conquer territory, build bases, or complete missions for rewards. Aside from other players, enemies also include NPCs such as malfunctioning robots and cannibal raiders.
To survive, players must find food, water, fuel, weapons and ammo. Injured players have to treat their wounds or risk bleeding to death.
If a player dies, they will respawn with limited items but secure safes and safehouses will be available to store valuables and respawn from.

Immersive Graphics in an Abandoned World
The game is developed using the latest version of Unreal Engine 5. The enormous map can be traversed in a variety of vehicles.
Custom skins are available for characters, vehicles and weapons.

  • Engage in PVP against other players
  • Choose from a variety of factions
  • Explore a vast cyberpunk city surrounded by an apocalyptic wasteland
  • Sign up for legal and illegal missions for low- or high-risk rewards, alone or in a group
  • Buy, sell, and trade items with other players through the virtual market
  • Attack or defend convoys, VIPs, and cargo shipments across the map
  • Capture, purchase, or build wasteland bases and shelters
  • Customize a wide range of vehicles, weapons, drones, characters & augmentations
detailed_description:
Team & Community

Decimated is being developed by Fracture Labs, an independent videogame studio of industry veterans collaborating on the project from all around the globe.

We encourage community feedback and often organize Q&A sessions and discuss progress through live broadcasts on our Twitch channel and the official Discord server. Join us to learn more and contribute!


Alpha Development

Decimated is in Alpha, and has a lot more work to be done. Everything you see so far is a placeholder and will be improved upon as we develop the game.

The closed alpha demo demonstrates multiplayer 3rd person combat, 3 classes with special abilities, grenades, jetpacks, vehicles, NPCs and multiple missions to do.

name: Decimated

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i7/i5 Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA Geforce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

short_description: Decimated is a 3rd person multiplayer online survival RPG. Fight against or team up with other players, scavenge loot, transport cargo or VIPs to other locations, collect legal or illegal resources and trade them, capture territory, and build safehouses for your gang.
